prompt:
Translate the following subtitles into Vietnamese. 

Please PRESERVE ALL the original timestamps for EACH ENTRY.

Subtitles to process:
[
  {
    "start": "00:00:00,000",
    "end": "00:00:02,840",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "This bird just get this carrot."
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:04,760",
    "end": "00:00:07,860",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "She is so beautiful with yellow eyes."
  }
]

ONLY and ALWAYS return a valid JSON back:
```json
[
  {
    "start": "timestamp",
    "end": "timestamp",
    "vi": "Vietnamese text"
  }
]
```

response.vi: Con chim này vừa lấy được cà rốt.
Nó đẹp quá với đôi mắt màu vàng.
